description:
Lying is more complicated than we think
Click my trainwell (formerly CoPilot) link http://go.trainwell.net/JohnnyHarris to get 14 days FREE with your own expert personal trainer!

Every single one of us has been lied to. And very often, we believe those lies.  Take a look inside Johnny’s actual brain to see why we fall for those lies and what we can do about it.

Special thanks to:
- MIT Department of Brain and Cognitive Sciences
- Affective Brain Lab (http://affectivebrain.com)
- Tali Sharot, PhD, Director of Affective Brain Lab
- India Pinhorn, Affective Brain Lab Coordinator
- Steven Shannon, Operations Manager at MIT MRI Center
- Stephen Lewandowsky, PhD
- Andrew Gordon, PhD

Check out all my sources for this video here: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1d-wn4PugC-Xio8Hg0FXgkZdC2XIuEcM0JTMxU2PfQf8/edit?usp=sharing

Check out my new channel with Sam Ellis - Search Party: https://youtube.com/@Search-Party

title: Why Your Brain Sucks at Detecting Lies
